name: Hoian Central Hotel
address: 301 Nguyen Duy Hieu, Son Phong Ward, Sơn Phong, Hội An, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Hội An, cách Hội Quán Chi Hội Triều Châu Trung Quốc 2 phút đi bộ, Hoian Central Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có xe đạp miễn phí, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, hồ bơi ngoài trời và khu vườn. Khách sạn 3 sao này có máy ATM và dịch vụ tiền sảnh. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, phòng chờ chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí.

Khách sạn sẽ cung cấp cho khách các phòng có điều hòa, bàn làm việc, ấm đun nước, minibar, két an toàn, TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh. Các căn có tủ quần áo.

Hoian Central Hotel có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet mỗi buổi sáng.

Chỗ nghỉ có sân hiên.

Hoian Central Hotel cách Bảo tàng lịch sử Hội An chưa đến 1 km và Chùa Cầu 11 phút đi bộ. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Đà Nẵng, cách khách sạn 30 km.

review.comment_positive: Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und zuvorkommend. Bei Fragen und Wünschen wird sich gekümmert. Die Zimmer sind sehr geräumig und die Betten komfortabel. Die Lage ist zentral aber schön ruhig. Das Frühstücksbuffet war das beste unserer ganzen Vietnam Reise. Viel Auswahl und frisches Obst. Es wird sich jeden Morgen liebevoll um den Garten gekümmert und die Blumen gegossen. Man merkt die persönliche Note
review.comment_negative: Für unseren Ausflug zum An Bang Beach liehen wir uns kostenlos Fahrräder aus. Leider war bei einem die Luft nach kurzer Zeit aus dem Reifen und der Sattel ließ sich nicht feststellen. Am besten vorher kontrollieren. Auch das Taxi zum Flughafen sollte 400.000 Vdg kosten. Wir haben ein anderes für 290.000 Vdg gefunden

La posizione eccezionale è il punto di forza, hotel semplice ma con tutti i confort. Bella la zona piscina e lo spazio colazione. Personale gentilissimo. Avevamo 2 camere, la deluxe all’interno con la finestra senza vista davanti al tetto vicino, l’altra sulla strada con un bel balconcino ma molto rumorosa (il prezzo pagato per immergersi nelle strade vietnamite!). Forse le camere affacciate sulla piscina al secondo piano sono le migliori. In ogni caso le nostre erano spaziose con letti e doccia grandi. Colazione con buoni prodotti abbastanza varia. 
Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo! 
Consigliato a chi non cerca il lusso ma vuole vivere nella città vecchia. Ci tornerei.

review.comment_positive: Fantastic room & staff. Seriously great value for the cost. I'm English speaking and the staff made communication a breeze. If I'm ever back in Hoi An this is where I'll stay. 10/10... highly recommend!

review.rating: A jewel in the heart of Hoi An
review.room_type: Phòng Executive đôi nhìn ra hồ bơi
review.comment_positive:
The hotel has a great location just a few steps from Hoin Old city centre (5 minutes walk). Everything was perfect during our stay. The staff quite helpful and even more, always with a big smile and taking care of us. The two receptionists (Chloe and Iris) gave us really nice tips about where to eat and places for visit (shops, shows, spa, ...).
We booked a facing pool room on 1st and 2nd floor; both of them were spacious, with a 2x2 very confortable bed and pillows; nice bathroom with a huge shower (2nd floor room) or a nice bath (1st floor). The rooms were pretty clean with a nice balcony with pool views.
Breakfast was served in the garden with a variety of Asian and European food, good coffee and tasted fruit juices.
I can only recommend this hotel to all who want to stay in the heart of the city for a very reasonable rate.
We will definitely come back to this hotel.
Thanks to all the staff for making us to have a wonderful memories of Hoi An.

review.rating: Value for money and high recommended!
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive: Exceptional hospitality. All the staffs were super attentive and the receptionists were informative, especially thanks to Irish. She walked me through a very thorough information about what to do and to eat in Hui An and even helping me with my booking in Danang later. The room was spacious, very comfortable beds and all room came with 2 umbrellas. It's very helpful for us as now it's the raining season. Besides, the morning breakfast had quite a good variety of foods. The staffs will clean all the used plate right after it's empty. Furthermore, the location is superb. Walkable distance to most of our favourable restaurants and very near to the central market and local attractions. It's definitely value for money. High recommended!!

review.rating: A perfect place to stay when in Hoi An, you won’t be disappointed.
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố Hoặc Vườn
review.comment_positive: Big and clean room and bathroom, comfortable bed, friendly and helpful staff, good breakfast, excellent location.

Staff was very helpful and knowledgable about the area. The manager here assisted us with our check-in and provided us with information of sight-seeings, places to eat, and tours around Hoi An. There were some confusions at first about the extra charge for a child traveling with us, but it was quickly resolved. Manager also offered us a complementary room upgrade. Buffet breakfast was good with lots of options, and staffs were well-trained in terms of assisting guests as well as cleaning plates off the table. The hotel is just 5-8 minutes walk to Old Quarter, and they also have bikes if you'd rather not walk. Room was very clean and spacious. The pool water is also clean and sitting area around the pool gets tidy up quite often.
review.comment_negative: There were lots of mosquitos in the room but it's a quick fix with some bug spray.

Las instalaciones son muy buenas, es un edificio histórico por lo que no pueden poner ascensor, pero las habitaciones son modernas y tienen de todo. El desayuno es muy completo.

This is such a beautiful place to stay, I felt so safe and comfortable there with our little girl. review.room_type: Phòng Executive đôi nhìn ra hồ bơi
review.comment_positive:
Location is perfect for Hoi An - walk to the old city centre and all the sites of the city. 
Breakfast is plentiful with a variety of options for different tastes - vietnamese, western, etc. lots of fruit, breads!
Room is spacious with effective AC, comfortable bed, large shower. Bottled water provided daily! 
Employees were absolutely fantastic, so helpful and polite, walking us through different local tour options and coordinating them with the tour providers for us so that we didnt have to figure out what to book. They took all payment directly as well so we didnt have to carry around tons of money.
They have bikes you can also take out, and umbrellas in the rooms, so you do not need to bring them yourself.
review.comment_negative: Slight downside is soundproofing and hot water can be slightly limited, but water was never cold.

review.comment_positive: The rooms are great and also large plus all the things you need.  The breakfast is incredible and there is a good variety.  The staff is very attentive and helpful.  I used the free hotel bikes to ride around the town. They really want your stay to be outstanding.
review.comment_negative: The weather was mostly rainy, but I had a fun time anyway.

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố Hoặc Vườn
review.comment_positive:
Marvellous! From the begging was a wonderful experience, they are very welcoming in every single detail. The room was huge, clean and tidy as same as I expected at the time of to book, it has a nice balcony with a city view which enhance it even more. At the courtyard, there's this beautiful and almost scenery pool, and next to it there was the buffet with amazing breakfast every morning, the service was amazing, always keep an eye on you (as a vegan) there were always options available. The location is perfect, 5 to 10 min walking to the Old Town, maybe 3 min to the market, surrounded by local restaurants.
Overall, I recommend 100% this hotel, when coming back to Hoi An there wouldn't be any doubt or even hesitation that I come back here. Amazing people and amazing service.
Lady at the reception was very nice. We stayed in Hoi An 1 day and she advised us what to see and where to try to eat without asking her.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel in the perfect location.
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful small hotel located on the edge of the pedestrianised old town. Couldn’t be closer. 
Spotlessly cleaned, immaculately maintained-great attention to detail. 
Swimming pool a good size, in a spectacular garden. 
The little touches- fresh flowers on the table at breakfast , complimentary fruit or juice when you’re relaxing by the pool. 
Excellent breakfast- fresh fruit, fresh juices, Asian, Western, eggs cooked to order. 
Large airy rooms big bathrooms, effective air con. 
Staff who know your name and greet you like a friend.

review.rating: The perfect hotel stay in Hoian

The breakfast is extensive.
review.comment_negative: The room had a musty smell with a diffuser in the room, but I think this is pretty common in the area with all of the floods. It didn't detract from the room for us, but it might bother some. If so, maybe a room on an upper floor would be better, but be aware there's no elevator.

Just some of the plusses: the swimming pool has both sun (if you like) and shade (our preference), it’s just a few steps away from the Old Town and breakfast buffet is served with a variety of local and international dishes. We received a very warm welcome and we would definitely love to come back.

review.rating: Good place to stay in Hoian
review.comment_positive: The hotel is located within minutes of walking to the conservation area where main attractions and places of interest are. The hotel is clean and well-run. The staff speaks relatively good English and is professional and helpful. The breakfast is alright, although it could have been more varied. The hotel is situated between two main roads. Ask for a room somewhere in the middle and it would be quiet, as it was in our case (room 3). I'll recommend this hotel for a stay in Hoian.

The hotel was lovely, one of the nicest hotels I've ever stayed in. It's really good value for money. The staff are so lovely and friendly and the location is great. The old town is in walking distance. The room was huge and really comfortable. The breakfast was superb. Will definitely return again one day.

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố Hoặc Vườn
review.comment_positive: I stayed 11 nights and loved it. The staff were exceptional both at reception and at breakfast. They were always smiling and happy to answer all of my questions. The property itself is a beautiful historical building which is very clean and well maintained. There was a good selection for breakfast plus pho or eggs were available on request. The location was easy walking distance to the Ancient City and bridge as well so many restaurants. I stayed in an Executive double and had a lovely garden patio to myself when I just wanted to relax. I was sad to move on but I will definitely be staying there again.

review.rating: 安心してホイアンの魅力を五感で味わえた。I felt at ease and was able to experience Hoi An's charms in all five senses.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
3泊しました。まず、日本橋、ホイアン市場など徒歩15分で行く事ができる立地。身の前にカフェ、薬屋、スパ、お土産物屋がある。
ホテルの玄関口が開放時でベトナム、中国、ヨーロッパの建築を融合した空間でかわいかった。全体的に清潔感がありプールも綺麗。植物への配慮、管理が行き届いていた。朝食付きのプランを予約したのは正解だった。(内容パン、ベトナム料理、卵料理、サラダ、ベトナムコーヒー、ティー、フルーツジュース、南国のフルーツなど)が提供されます。4月初旬だったので乾期でしたが、日中は30℃を越えるため徒歩は厳しいので、無料のノーマル自転車をかりて外出した。タクシーなどでいくには不便な場所へ行くのに大変助かりました。右側通行でした。
大人5名でミーソン遺跡約1時間 チャータータクシー予約しました。定額で現地で待機してくれます。8時半ホテル出発、12時ホテル到着一人1000円から1500円くらい。変動なあり

I stayed here for 3 nights. First of all, the location of the hotel is very convenient, as it is only a 15-minute walk to the Japanese bridge and Hoi An market. There are cafes, pharmacy, spa, and souvenir shops in front of the hotel.
 The entrance to the hotel is open and the space is a fusion of Vietnamese, Chinese, and European architecture, and it is lovely. Overall, the hotel is clean and the pool is beautiful. The plants were well cared for and managed. It was a good decision to book the breakfast package. (The hotel is located in front of a café, pharmacy, spa, and souvenir shop, which serves bread, Vietnamese food, egg dishes, salads, Vietnamese coffee, tea, fruit juices, tropical fruits, etc. It was early April, so it was dry season, but the temperature was over 30℃ during the day, so walking was not an option. It was very helpful to get to places that were inconvenient to go by cab. We were on the right side of the road.

항상 웃는 얼굴이시며, 수영장 이용시간이 지났는데도, 허락을 구하고 수영장을 이용할 수 있게 해주셨습니다. 밤늦은 시간이었는데 타월도 챙겨주셨어요. 다음에 호이안에 오게 된다면 반드시 다시 올 것 같아요. 시설도 정말 깔끔하고 군더더기 없습니다. 조식도 훌륭합니다. 위치 역시 올드타운 근처라 이동하기엔 더할 나위 없습니다.

review.rating: Un hotel tranquilo y para disfrutar en calma

review.comment_positive: Muy cerca del casco antiguo. Habitación grande. Tiene piscina y una bonita terraza. Nos ponían fruta fresca cuando estábamos en la piscina. En el hotel tienen bicicletas a libre disposición con las que pudimos ir a la playa. Todo el Personal del hotel fue muy amable. En especial Iris fue muy atenta, nos recomendó actividades y hizo por nosotros varias gestiones de contratación entradas espectáculo nocturno, taxi y excursión a My Son. Nos trataron muy bien. Hotel muy tranquilo, recomendable para evitar masificaciones. Muchas gracias!!
La gentillesse et le professionnalisme et l'accueil du personnel

All the tables and chairs were made for locals and not for European sizes. So that aspect was not confortable.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel, great location, lovely staff
review.room_type: Phòng Executive đôi nhìn ra hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel tastefully decorated in the traditional Vietnamese wooden furnishings. Both the room and bathroom were spacious and clean. The balcony was nice  to relax at the end of a long day out. The pool was also great to cool down from the heat. Buffet breakfast was plentiful with a good variety. I especially liked the ice coffee and mi quang. Great location, only a short walk to the centre. The girls at reception were friendly and sweet, answering all our questions and booked our day trip to My Son. Highly recommend staying here and hope to return soon!

review.rating: Amazing colonial hotel in old town but away from the hustle bustle to let you take life at your pace
review.comment_positive:
Room- large colonial style rooms with old world charm, modern conveniences, an AC that cooled the room rapidly and comfy beds. the only room in Vietnam with a desk and a chair in our trip. Large windows in the room and bathroom give you an amazing sense of space
Breakfast-a reasonable spread next to the pool with a couple of tables set in the lawn and rest in a verandah.
Pool- very nice small pool quite shallow with a few deck chairs around. amazing facility set in the back so nice and quiet and private with lots of tall flowering plants leading to a pleasant atmosphere.
Staff were very knowledgable and guided us to excellent experiences which we may have missed otherwise. Did not feel as if we were being overcharged at any time.
worth the money we spent.

A nice touch. Thank you!

However stepping into, there is a swimming pool and dining surrounded with greenery and flowers in the cener courtyard, and other tables and chairs are placed at strategic points in the open-air spaces.
 
The calm smiles of the staff also blend with such meticulous design, and they seems to create a beatiful world inside apart from the hustle and bustle of cars and motorcycles outside.

The shower is open, so water splashes into the toilet and sink. But I guess that's how it's designed.

review.comment_positive: Het hotel heeft een prachtige tuin waar we vanaf ons balkon op uitkeken. De kamers en de rest van het hotel zijn erg mooi en alles voelt vers. Bij sommige hotels zijn de foto's wat optimistisch maar dat is hier zeker niet het geval. Alles ziet er mooi uit. Het bed dat wij hadden is het meest comfortabele bed dat ik tijdens de rondreis ben tegengekomen. Qua locatie ligt het perfect. Met twee stappen sta je in het oude centrum. De receptioniste heeft ons getipt over de Hoi An Memories lightshow. Die show werd eigenlijk nergens anders genoemd terwijl die echt weergaloos mooi is. Het is een fantastisch mooie show en die moet je absoluut meepakken als je in Hoi An verblijft.

review.comment_positive: Good hotel with an excellent location near to the old town. Staff allowed us to pay for our airport transport by credit card, and were otherwise always flexible and helpful. Breakfast in the morning was good, though admittedly suffered in comparison to other more spectacular breakfasts we'd had elsewhere in Vietnam. Worth staying mainly for the location.
review.comment_negative: We had booked two rooms - one was significantly better than the other. The larger one, at the back of the second building, had no issues; the one next door seemed less frequently used, and periodically had bad smells, insects in the bathroom, and felt damp. To their credit, when notified of this the staff sent an immediate clean-up team to the room, including an electric lemongrass humidifier that counteracted the bad smell and successfully made the room much nicer.

Todo 
El estilo 
La ubicación 
La atención del personal 
El desayuno

review.rating: Home away from home and unmatched customer service
review.comment_positive: Where does one begin? Do I begin with the price factor, the excellent breakfast, accessibility to nearby locations, the super comfy swimming pool or the ultra excellent customer service? Because for us Hoian Central Hotel was all of the above. We were in touch with the amazing Jasmine (who's undoubtedly the best customer service hotel personnel I've come across in my life) from the start of our trip; she even arranged for airport transfers (Da Nang to Hoi An and back), checked us in and handed over a tip sheet with recommendations for great food, local sightseeing and non touristy recommendations. Jasmine checked us in as if we were her family members; such was the level of commitment. The rooms were next level, the massive bathroom with amazing aesthetic fittings and the strong Wi-Fi just kept us going. The breakfast was an amazing array of local Vietnamese delicacies and European selection. Jasmine's colleagues Chloe and the lady from the breakfast stall were super friendly. I took my mandatory laps in the pool to cool down from the humid heat of Hoi An and it was very refreshing. Also, at the hotel you can use their complimentary bicycles to go around the city; we hiked 11 kms to the beautiful An Bang beach courtesy the bikes. To sum up, the experience that Hoian Central Hotel gave us thanks to their staff members will be with us for the rest of our life; I doubt if anyone could match their price point and even their hospitality service. Keep up the great work!

Das Hotel liegt zentral in der Altstadt. Die Gebäude mit dem begrünten Innenhof, wo sich der Pool und der Frühstücksraum befinden sind sehr ansprechend gestaltet. Das Frühstücks Buffet war ausreichend, leider ohne Müsli und mit Scheiblettenkäse. Die Zimmer sind geräumig und gut ausgestattet.
Das Personal ist sehr hilfsbereit und zuvorkommend und gibt gute Tipps für Exkursionen und Veranstaltungen, die man auch direkt dort buchen kann.
review.comment_negative:
Es mangelte stellenweise an Sauberkeit. Die Tischdecken wurden zwischen den Gästen nicht gewechselt, auch wenn sie sehr schmutzig waren. Im Zimmer lag Müll hinter der Minibar und das kleine Badezimmerfenster bedarf einer dringenden Reinigung.
Ein Tipp für das Management: Es wäre schön, hinsichtlich des Umweltschutzes und der Abfallvermeidung, die Portionsfläschchen mit Duschgel und Shampoo durch auffüllbare Flaschen zu ersetzen. Dies spart im übrigen auch Kosten.

review.comment_positive: 가성비 정말 좋은 호텔입니다. 조식도 맛있습니다. 후기대로 빵이 정말 맛있더군요~물론 다른 메뉴들도 맛있었습니다. 시부모님도 만족해 하셨습니다.직원분들 너무 친절하셨고 이것저것 설명도 잘 해주셨어요~수영장도 있어서 아이들 더위 식히며 놀기 좋았습니다. 10분~15분거리에 시장, 호이안구시가지, 야시장 다 있고 도보로 이동 가능합니다. 숙소 근처에 작은 슈퍼도 있고 위치 최고입니다. 룸 컨디션 좋았고 벌레 없고 오토바이 소리가 종종 났지만 거슬릴 정도는 아니였습니다. 비품들도 잘 구성되어 있었고 우산도 구비되어 있었습니다. 대가족 여행인데 후기랑 사진만보고 선택해서 혹시나....사진만큼 아니면 어쩌나 걱정했는데 기대 이상이였습니다. 다음에 또 베트남 여행 온다면 꼭 재방문 할 생각입니다. 여행가는 친구들에게도 추천할거예요. 친절한 서비스에 다시한번 감사드립니다. 저희식구 모두 너무 잘 쉬고 갑니다~ 감사합니다.^^
review.comment_negative: 엘리베이터가 없어서 아쉽다는 후기가 많았지만 캐리어도 방으로 다 옮겨주시고 체크아웃할때 프론트 전화하면 내려주셔서 불편한건 하나도 없었습니다.

review.rating: Hotel precioso con un trato excepcional
review.room_type: Phòng Executive đôi nhìn ra hồ bơi
review.comment_positive:
Estuvimos en diciembre 2022. El hotel precioso, a apenas cinco minutos andando del “centro histórico” pero en una calle ya bonita, el personal tiene un nivel alto de inglés (mucho más que la media en Vietnam) lo cual se agradece si se necesita ayuda.

Si se puede, pedir con vistas a la piscina que es preciosa y no hay ruido alguno. El desayuno también muy bien.

Pero lo mejor de todo el personal. Le pregunté a la encargada de recepción -Iris- por unos caramelos que ofrecen ahí y me dijo que se podían comprar en tiendas del centro.

Al día siguiente me preguntó si los había encontrado y le dije que no…¡y me regaló una bolsa de caramelos que me había comprado! Alucinante.

No solo por el detallazo, sino que también hay que tener en cuenta que con todas las horas que echa en el trabajo -la noche anterior la había visto a las 21:30- ahí estaba a las 8:00 con mi bolsa de caramelos.

Jamás en la vida me había pasado nada parecido. Una de las mejores cosas del viaje, la verdad.

Si podéis, id a este hotel.

review.comment_positive: Personale gentilissimo, struttura molto curata e colazione eccellente

review.rating: Great location to explore the sights of Hoi An.
review.comment_positive: The property is well located in old town . The staff was excellent from the moment we arrived until we checked out. The room was comfortable to relax in after a long day of exploring. There was a nice honor bar where you could get a cold beer or bottle of wine which was nice.

Staff go above and beyond to make sure guests and happy and comfortable. They helped us book a taxi back to Da Nang with a cheaper fare, and gave us recommendations for things to do and places to eat. Rooms were spacious, breakfast was quite nice, lovely swimming pool in the garden area.
review.comment_negative: There could have been a few more food and drink options at breakfast, I think you could order iced coffees etc if you ask staff specifically, but this wasn’t signposted anywhere so we weren’t sure what was available. Bed sheets smelt a little damp when we first got there but this seemed to fade.

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố Hoặc Vườn
review.comment_positive: Emplacement parfait près du centre-ville, chambre spacieuse calme et confortable. Un grand merci au personnel très accueillant et professionnel qui nous a indiqué les bons restaurants et s’est occupé de contacter taxi et musée pour Da Nang. Bon rapport qualité/prix

Địa điểm rất gần Phố cổ, có thể đi bộ hoặc đi xe đạp vài phút là tới. Nhân viên nhiệt tình, hướng dẫn rất cẩn thận. Đồ ăn sáng tuy không nhiều nhưng ngon và nóng. Khi ra về gia đình mình còn được tặng 1 món quà nhỏ. Nói chung là cả nhà mình đều khá hài lòng về ks.
review.comment_negative: View phòng mình nhìn ra không được đẹp. Nhưng giường lớn và phòng ốc cũng rất thoải mái.

review.comment_positive:
Nice staff. She gave me many information about Hoi An.
Nice, clean and big room

review.rating: Hoian central is a perfect hotel for families
review.comment_positive: Hoian Central is a beautiful hotel in a fantastic location. We stayed here with our 3 teenage children and this is a perfect hotel for us - with beautiful pool and gardens, comfortable rooms, friendly staff, free bikes, great breakfast selection and excellent location in walking distance to all major attractions. Would love to stay again!
Location excellent, staff so attentive and really willing to go the extta mile. Breakfast tasty in a really cute garden area. Overall, unbelievable value for money.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe 3 Người Nhìn ra Thành phố

review.comment_negative: the shower mixer was a bit off

review.rating: Viel besser als erwartet und erhofft! Einfach 10 Sterne
review.comment_positive:
Es war alles einfach phantastisch! Besonders das sehr aufmerksame und freundliche Personal! Für alles gab es Hilfe und Unterstützung. Räder gibt es kostenlos vom Hotel und die Tipps waren alle klasse.
Die Lage ist perfekt! Absolut zentral und dennoch ruhig!
Und das Frühstück…. Umwerfend!

There was a lovely, peaceful, calming atmosphere. The hotel had a lush, other wordly feel about it and all the staff were truly wonderful. We often had the garden/ pool area to ourselves, and we were frequently brought fresh fruit and watermelon juice. It felt like our own private villa. Thank you so much Rosie, Quyen, Jasmine and the porters and cleaning ladies - every single one was warm, welcoming, helpful and kind. We really hope to come back one day.
Nhân viên quá ư là tuyệt vời . Về còn được quà

The hotel is a short walk from the markets, the river, and lots of places to eat. Bikes are available, and the beaches are an easy bike ride away (which we didn't do because it was pouring rain--but we did use their umbrellas). Breakfast was delicious.

Hotel's offer bicycle to ride around town. Swimming pool is also beautiful. Very impressed with the hotel and services. They also reply your message really quick. Highly recommended 👍

Our second stay during our holiday. Only this time, sadly, for one night. Once again greeted with warm smiles and a lovely large room. Will definitely be back in the future. Cam on va hen gap lai Rossie and all the team at Hoian Central. 🌺

review.rating: Beautiful hotel, great location and lovely staff
review.room_type: Phòng Executive đôi nhìn ra hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Beautiful hotel with the classic Vietnam architecture and wooden furnishings. The room and bathroom were both spacious and clean. The balcony was a lovely touch to chill out and enjoy the view of the courtyard and pool at the end of a long day out. The pool was also a great place to cool down from the heat. The breakfast buffet was plentiful, I especially enjoyed the iced coffee and mi quang. Close to the centre with just a short walk. The girls at reception were so lovely and sweet and were helpful with all the questions we had and booked our day tour to My Son. Highly recommend staying here and will hopefully return soon!

review.comment_positive: excellent services from the staff, especially reception Chloe. Super helpful with everything, arranging for all transportation and tickets. Good breakfast spread. Central location very near old town. Definitely will choose this hotel for any return visit. Can't ask for anything more.
Lovely Hotel in Hoian and near the heart of Hoian ❤️
review.comment_negative: A bit noisy in the morning because we stayed in the ground floor near breakfast area.

직원들이 친절하고, 숙소 위치도 좋았습니다. 근처에 시장도 있고, 맛집도 있고, 바구니배 타는 곳과 올드타운 중간에 위치했어요. 수영장도 낮에 나무 그늘져서 수영하기도 좋았습니다.
review.comment_negative:
1층 숙소는 피하세요. 엘리베이터 없는 3층 건물인데, 어차피 짐은 들어다 주시거든요, 2층 이상 올라가세요.
1층에 분수대 물소리도 다 들리고,오토바이 소리, 수영장도 있어서 습해요

Check-in was relaxed and comfortable with a welcome drink. the room was larger than expected, very clean and well serviced. One of the best selling points of this hotel  is its staff  - Very, very helpful in all  aspects of what you may need and any issues you have. Breakfast is buffet style with great variety - For me 10 out of 10  for this hotel and its staff

Gute Lage, sehr freundliches Personal. Schönes geräumiges Zimmer, gutes Frühstück und schneller Wäscheservice.

The free bikes need some.TLC. they are fine, but I ended up hiring one for $1.20 for the whole day, and it felt safer. The tyres were in good condition, not flat etc. 
The bike concierge could be a bit more helpful. 
The pool isn't super cold as it gets a lot of sun. It's not as refreshing as some. 
But overall, it was wonderful, safe, and  family-friendly . I recommend this hotel.

review.comment_positive: Very friendly and helpful staff. The room was clean, comfortable and modern with a great bathroom. The hotel is tranquil yet perfectly located just a short walk to the centre of Hoi An. The perfect place to stay for easy access to Hoi An centre.
review.comment_negative: The pool could have been cleaned

review.rating: Wonderful hotel with charm and excellent facilities close to the old town.
review.room_type: Phòng Executive đôi nhìn ra hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: This is a great property, near the old town with lovely rooms, AC and fans, a pool and courtyard.  The staff were fantastic and helped me organize activities, arranged laundry and transport.  You can use hotel bicycles to get to the beach and around town.  Nice towels and linens and the room was quiet.  I had a great balcony with a view over the garden.
review.comment_negative: My first hotel room had a balcony door that didn’t lock well.

review.comment_positive: Staff went over and above to do little things for you and to help you as best they could. Example: offering small trays of cut up fruit and glasses of juice while relaxing around the pool, purchasing a heater to deal with the dampness in our room, always remembering who we were and being very engaging.
review.comment_negative: It was very damp and humid in our room. Everything from clothes to bedding to even envelopes and pieces of paper picked up moisture and was impossible to get rid of. It was a constant feeling of clammyness and dampness that permeated everything. Even myself. The staff brought in a plug in heater to the room but the dampness was just too big a problem.for a small heater. Even the walls felt damp. It was quite uncomfortable and only resolved by checking out and going to our next hotel.

review.comment_positive: Todo perfecto

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố Hoặc Vườn

review.rating: Great location and service by old town
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố Hoặc Vườn
review.comment_positive: Location was perfect, just at the edge of old town and a quick walk to all the action in Hoi An.  The staff was very nice, welcoming and went out of their way to make sure our stay was excellent. The breakfast was simple and in the courtyard near the pool - small but decent selection of food items.  We had 2 rooms and were not able to get them next to each other but both rooms were comfortable and in traditional style.   The best part of this hotel is location and staff.  Free bikes for rent is a great plus - good condition and my husband took it to explore going over to the beach early in the morning.
review.comment_negative: Nothing to dislike,  very charming space in Hoian.  The main lobby was open and the breakfast area is outside was well with fans, something to think about when you go in the summer and miss a/c until you get to your room.  But this is just part of the area/feel of the space.

review.rating: Very great location, big room, clean, beautiful balcony view of the courtyard and pool, lovely breakfast setting in the
review.room_type: Phòng Executive đôi nhìn ra hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Very great location, big room, clean, beautiful balcony view of the courtyard and pool, lovely breakfast setting in the courtyard with good food. Staff gave us great recommendations and were helpful and sweet.

The location of this hotel was incredible, it was a stones throw walk to the old town and in such a nice quiet spot. The hotel itself was extremely clean and the rooms were very spacious. The pool and breakfast included were an added bonus. My friend and I would also like to personally thank all the staff working there - especially Chloe and Rosie who were exceptionally accommodating to us and made our stay that much enjoyable and special by ensuring we were always well looked after and had the right information to get us around town. I would 100% come back to this hotel! They had free bikes to use for guests to get around as well which was an added bonus. Staff are incredible !! Thank you so much for the stay.
Location was fantastic, the bed was comfortable and the staff were really lovely.

The position of the hotel is very near to the old town and river. The free bikes are very handy for early morning rides . We had three rooms of various kinds and all were spacious, clean and had very comfortable beds and linen.
review.comment_negative: The only issue that could be improved is the access to filtered water, there is a small jug In reception but a fill up station would help reduce the volume of plastic water bottles tourists use.

review.rating: High quality boutique hotel in a central location
review.room_type: Phòng Executive đôi nhìn ra hồ bơi
review.comment_positive: Fantastic location right beside the old town but still the hotel inside is calm and quiet. Large spacious rooms, spotlessly clean, balcony to sit on. Great to have a pool to relax in after the hustle and bustle of the town. Also can’t compliment the staff enough - they were so helpful and lovely. We stayed a week and they were concerned about making sure we weren’t bored with breakfast which was so nice! When we were leaving they all came out to wave us off which was lovely!
Hotel & room very clean with tea & coffee facilities. The staff were very helpful and friendly. The hotel was in a very good location, with a good breakfast each morning.

The hotel is a good choice if you want to stay within walking distance of the Old Town. That said, they have bicycles to borrow if you want to stray further afield. The room had all I needed and the breakfast had a wide choice, served by a very helpful staff. The reception staff were efficient in arranging a car and driver for trips to My Son and back to Danang station. There are plenty of spas, restaurants, and shops nearby. I would stay at the Central again.
review.comment_negative: The pool is much smaller than it appears in the promotion photos.

review.comment_positive: Lage, Frühstück und das Personal. Zimmer sind schön groß und sehr gute Services.

review.rating: Beautiful hotel with very friendly and helpful staff.
review.comment_positive: The staff is excellent!  The girls at the front desk are warm and welcoming. There is a lot of fruit options, beyond the amount I have found at any other hotel.  However, there is too much pork.  It seemed to be in everything.  Vegetarian spring rolls would have been nice and other options.
review.comment_negative: Not having so much pork in the breakfast dishes.  I prefer an Asian breakfast, but the pork made it difficult to find much to eat.

L'insieme è sobrio ed elegante ad un prezzo molto competitivo. Lo consiglio vivamente per un piacevole soggiorno ad Hoi An.

review.rating: Gorgeous hotel with extremely friendly and helpful staff!
review.comment_positive: What an amazing hotel! Fabulous staff and in particular Iris at the front desk was extremely helpful. She was able to organise all we wanted to do and see. We were upgraded on check in and the room was delightful. The bed was comfy the pool, very refreshing and the breakfast amazing! The shower pressure was great and their was no noise for sleeping! I would book again!

review.rating: Great location and excellent value for money
review.comment_positive: Location location location! This hotel has so much character and is handy to everything. The lovely lady that checked us in couldn't have been more helpful, marking up a map to show us where to find everything we needed. The rooms were spacious, the beds comfortable and the rather large bathroom was clean. We had plenty of room to spread ourselves out. Breakfast was served in the beautiful garden adjacent to the sparkling pool; such a relaxing and peaceful ambience. They also have pushbikes available for free, and it is an easy ride out to An Bang beach through the rice paddies. We really loved our stay here.

review.comment_positive: Everything about Hoi An Central Hotel was excellent! You can’t beat the location or value for money. The staff was exceptional and the room was clean and comfortable. 10/10 would stay here again.

review.rating: Un hotel fantástico en una ciudad preciosa.
review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố Hoặc Vườn
review.comment_positive: El hotel es precioso. Da gusto darse un baño en la piscina y luego desayunar en el bonito jardín. Desayuno estupendo, por cierto. El personal es extremadamente amable, empezando por Jasmine. Las habitaciones son espaciosas y están perfectamente aisladas. Está a un paso del mercado, el río y el centro. En la misma puerta, te hacen una manicura de 10 en el Cat’s Spa. Te prestan bicis para darte una vuelta por la ciudad o ir hasta los arrozales. Muy recomendable.
review.comment_negative: No hay ascensor. Pero te suben y bajan las maletas. Si tenéis problemas de movilidad, pedid una habitación en la planta baja.

review.comment_positive: very friendly staff and an amazing location

review.room_type: Phòng Executive Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Cảnh Thành Phố Hoặc Vườn
review.comment_positive: l’accueil

Localização maravilhosa. 
Café da manhã muito bom

Amazing location, big and comfortable rooms, Superb staff!! A 2 minute walk takes you to the Old Town/Old quarter, which is where everything is. The most famous restaurant serving the lip smacking local  dishes Mi Quang and Cao Lai is right in the alley next to the hotel. Almost everywhere is walking distance. We had 2 rooms, and they were both very large, comfortable and clean. There was a ceiling fan as well as AC for a change. In that kind of humidity, a fan is a must!! The breakfast was quite nice, with a good combination of local and continental cuisine. The most standout aspect of the hotel is the staff. Special shout out to Chloe. She helped us figure out where everything was, on a map that they keep for their guests, showed us the best walking route to the Memories of Hoi An show, and actually called her mom to find out how I could buy Cao Lai noodles to take back home. When we were leaving the hotel, for Danang, the staff gave us bottles of water, and a big packet of coconut biscuits for the road trip ahead. The hospitality is on another level!! For Salt Coffee fans, there's a salt coffee stall in the lane right behind the.hotel that sells amazing Ca phe Muoi for just 15K Dong. 
Would most definitely recommend this hotel!!
review.comment_negative: Just 1 small feedback- please keep glass water bottles of drinking water in the room that can be refilled by the guests from a common water cooler. I had to keep asking the staff to fill my empty plastic water bottles, since I didn't want to keep buying new ones, being environmentally conscious and all..

review.comment_positive: A gem of a hotel in an excellent location.

Great staff, cozy facilities, and amazing location. We had a magic time in Hoi An, and the property was a big reason why. We felt extremely welcomed at Hoian Central, and will definitely recommend this to our friends.

Hotel céntrico y nuevo con habitaciones espaciosas y cómodas. La piscina es preciosa y el desayuno servido en el jardín el mejor que tuvimos en nuestro viaje por Vietnam. Todo el personal muy atento y pendiente de lo que necesitas en todo momento. Ubicación inmejorable.

Ho soggiornato in questa struttura durante il mio viaggio in Vietnam e, tra le tante che avevo cercato, è sicuramente un’ottima scelta.
L’hotel si trova in una posizione comoda per raggiungere i principali siti di interesse ma comunque lontana dal caos della parte turistica (alla quale si può arrivare con soli 10 minuti di passeggiata).
La struttura è pulita e immersa nel verde, sembra di stare fuori città, piante e fiori ovunque rendono la colazione un momento piacevole e appagante. La piscina è un toccasana, il personale è gentile ed educato e ti aiuta in tutto, offrono anche della frutta mentre stai comodamente a bordo piscina a rilassarti.
Bici gratuite per girare la città a disposizione dei clienti dell’hotel.
Noi abbiamo avuto un piccolo problema con la struttura durante il nostro soggiorno ma, nonostante tutto, sono riuscito a farsi perdonare con gentilezza!
review.comment_negative: Il personale che sta alla reception la sera/notte non parla l’inglese, la cosa rende difficile riuscire a trovare soluzioni in caso di problemi!
